resources.string: Tulsa Zoo
California Sea Lions are mammals. They must breathe at the surface and hold their breath while underwater.
American alligators are predators with many special adaptations for hunting in dark waters.
Aldabra tortoises are specially adapted for island life.
African penguins are birds. Despite their heritage, they are aquatic predators and are specially adapted to life at sea.
Elephants have specialized adaptations to accommodate their large size.
Chimpanzees are social animals and specially adapted for communal troop life.
Chinese alligators are ectothermic; they rely on the outside environment to regulate their body temperatures.
Although giraffes are mostly known for their impressive height, the rest of a giraffe’s body is super-sized as well.
Komodo dragons possess many adaptations that allowed them to ascend to royal heights.
Tigers have many adaptations to help them live in a variety of habitats across Asia.
Snow leopards are specially adapted for mountain life.
The horns on white rhinos are more than decorative. Rhinos use their horns for many different functions.

Unlike other cats, lions are social animals that are specially adapted for communal life in the pride.

African painted dogs are an intelligent and social carnivore living in packs of 6–20 individuals. Although led by a breeding pair like wolves, the pack’s structure is defined through posturing and complex submission ceremonies instead of aggression. The old, injured, and pups are cared for by the entire pack, and the youngest always eats first.
